data.system_settings: Windows 10 x64 v1803 - Google Chrome x64 v67.0.3396.99
data.actual_result: The button is overlapping the text
data.short_description: [Website Bug]The Copy to Clipboard button overlaps the text in update presence code
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a Small Window - Open the Developer Portal - Go to Applications - Click or create a application - Go to Rich Presence - Scroll down the page and press in "Show Code"
